1.content: so. which of the girls of our story would you like?
1.title: beginning of something 'big'

11.content:
Ah our staff weilding heroine hmm?
then what sort of expansion shall she undergo.?
11.title: Sakura

111.content: How will Sakura's breasts get bigger?
111.title: breast inflation

113.content:
ok, now for the fun part. how will our daring card captor gain weight? will it be through natural means, such as getting lazy and overeating, or maybe she'll be kidnapped and force fed. maybe even an unknown card effect has its way with her?

you decide.
113.title: weight gain.

choices: A new card for mischief to be made with!
Some of the other cards might have hidden effects, if Sakura isn't careful...
1133.content: So, a card effect! Well, these card effects could come from a current card, or perhaps even a new card. Which will it be~?
1133.title: Heart of the Cards-wait, wrong series!

choices: The Glutton Card! Straight-up fattening ahoy!
The World! Or perhaps, another card set~
11331.content:
So! You've chosen a new card instead. Which of these suit your fancy?

Glutton Card: Rather straightforward, it could have a number of effects. Primarily, however, it would affect Sakura by increasing her appetite and making her far more susceptible to weight gain, if not just increasing how fat she gets from meals.

World Card: This one, perhaps, falls into Tomoyo's hands (also known as Madison.) We all know the affection that Tomoyo feels, but what if Tomoyo felt something else to go with it? This card changes the world to the wishes of the person who wields it, usually in more subtle ways.

These are only the first two, however, so you can choose from the 'World' option and go for another!
11331.title: New cards abound...~

113311.content:
So, you can choose the Glutton Card here, or go for another card.

The Sweet card: this card opens a portal to a world made of sweets and candy, with fattening adventures ensuing.

The Yummy card: this card makes anything the user eats delicious and extremely fattening.
113311.title: The Glutton Card OR Another card type.

115.content: So which expansion shall Sakura undergo?..
115.title: other

12.content: How will the camera fiend sidekick expand?
12.title: Madison

121.content: What causes her breasts to get bigger?
121.title: Breast inflation

122.content: And what causes her butt to get bigger?
122.title: Butt expansion

choices: An effect by an undiscovered card
123.content: Now then, how exactly does our raven-haired camera-wielding girl pack on the pounds, hmm? Will Madison's weight be a willing gain, will she be force fed to obesity, or will it be an effect by an undiscovered card?
123.title: Weight gain

choices: She thinks Sakura will be attracted to her if she's a BBW.
1231.content: What's her motive for packing on the pounds?
1231.title: Willing weight gain

125.content: Alright which of these's did Madison go through?
125.title: Something else.

info.brief_description: the Girls of Cardcaptor Sakura get bigger in many ways.
info.description:
In this story, the many girls of cardcaptor sakura expand and get huge. its up to you who gets big and how.
added the 18+ rating incase someone decides to post a graphic chapter.

UPDATE WITH RULES:

OK so it appears there are some very strange ideas as to the meaning of the word 'EXPANSION' among you, so let me be as monosyllabic as possible.

EXPANSION means GROW

No shrinking, No GTS (not cuz its not expansion but because I despise it and there are GTS stories on this site by the dozen) No transformation, No sex unless it is part of a pregnancy story, and absolutely no scat, watersports, or anything else that is freakish like foot expansion or uneven expansions.

I am deleting all chapters to do with such things, and will not be putting them back.

One last rule, Those who can't actually write in coherent english will have their chapters deleted.

thank you and good day.
